personal.name: SAQIB
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.tagline: Building exceptional web experiences that captivate, foster trust and drive growth
personal.subtitle: Crafting seamless, purposeful, and polished touchpoints for every user
personal.summary: Frontend Developer (2+ years) experienced in React, Redux, and TypeScript, specializing in reusable components, API integration, and responsive UI design. Focus on crafting minimalist, aesthetic, simplicity, and highly detailed work.

experience.description: Developing and maintaining Web3 applications using Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
achievements: Building landing pages and scalable frontend features to support blockchain-based products
Implementing reusable UI components and integrating Web3 libraries for seamless wallet and dApp interactions
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver responsive, high-performance user experiences

experience.description: Built and maintained scalable web applications using React.js, Redux, and TypeScript, delivering consistent performance across all devices.
achievements: Developed pixel-perfect UIs based on Figma designs, ensuring responsive behavior and accessibility
Refactored and modularized SCSS codebase, improving maintainability and reducing CSS bloat by 30%
Implemented reusable React components to standardize design patterns and reduce duplicate logic
Integrated secure RESTful APIs for dynamic data rendering, error handling, and edge-case management
Managed Git versioning and deployment workflows via Azure DevOps

projects.title: Resume Analyzer
projects.description: A web app that analyzes resumes on 15+ ATS parameters and generates a 100-point score. Improved keyword match rates by 30% and helped 75% of users boost scores by 20%+.
achievements: Designed a responsive UI with React & Tailwind CSS, achieving 100% Lighthouse accessibility score
Integrated Puter.js for seamless cloud hosting and deployment
Enabled instant file uploads, real-time feedback, and cross-device access with 99.9% uptime
